tool_description: Returns a hashed word or phrase with full UTF-8 encoding support using most secure hashing algorithms such as MD5, SHA1, SHA2, SHA3, Whirlpool and many more.
name: Hash Brown
title: Hash Brown

api_list.name: GET certain hashed word or phrase
api_list.description:
This is the only valid endpoint the Hash Brown API provides, it is worth to mention the hashing output is not salted.
Return a JSON array with one object, the hashing algorithms property names within the object are uppercase. 
Enjoy. 
More  algorithms to come soon!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hash-brown.p.rapidapi.com/hash/TryTheHashBrownAPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hash-brown.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hash-brown.p.rapidapi.com/hash/{wordorphrasetohash}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hash-brown.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
